body.name: Better & Better Natural Bamboo Toothbrush | Soft Bristles | 100% Plant-Based | Reusable Handle and Replaceable Brush Head | Eco-Friendly, Zero Plastic | Adult Size, Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 10 mins
features: Natural & Beautiful Bamboo - Improve your brushing routine with Better & Better’s Natural Bamboo toothbrush with soft, natural, plant-based bristles made from castor bean oil.

Eco-Friendly & Zero Plastic - Brush away plaque and gunk gently, safely, and comfortably. Available in two colors, all made from beautiful, natural bamboo. The reusable handle of our soft bristle toothbrush fits seamlessly with the replaceable brush heads. They're easy to hold and grip for comfy and efficient brushing sessions.

Soft, 100% Plant-Based Bristles - Adult-sized soft toothbrush with natural bristles perfect for sensitive teeth. Every stroke feels like a gum massage. Our bamboo toothbrushes have soft and gentle bristles that work hard to clean gently.

Keep the Handle, Refresh Your Brush Head - Brush in comfort and smile even brighter with a bamboo toothbrush that’s better for you and even better for the planet. This extra soft toothbrush for sensitive teeth with a reusable bamboo handle and replaceable plant-based brush head is certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny, vegan, and contains zero plastic. Replace your bamboo natural toothbrush head every 3 months.

Better for You, Better for the Planet - We set out to make toothbrushes that are good in every way. Our bamboo toothbrushes create less waste when replaced. We prioritize the health of our bodies and our planet, which leads us to imagine entirely new ways of doing things. And as we minimize the ecological effects of our products and packaging, we create a better world.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make the switch.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to make the switch to a more earth friendly toothbrush. The bristles are soft enough for my sensitive gums. I compost directly in my backyard which is a plus. The only thing I do not like is that they market as zero plastic but when you get a new brush head it comes in plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great speed and quality product
reviews.reviewText: Excellent for no plastic refill tooth brush head replacement

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good Toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunate that the replacement top portion of the toothbrush, is the same price as the first full size brush with the handle portion.Obviously I'm happy with a more sustainable product that is used a few times a day. But the replacement brush head I would expect to be a bit less expensive than the entire brush.The original brush head lasted for quite some time, being used 2 or 3 times daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft bristles, Works great, Brush head is a little narrow, but that's personal preference
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to compare with another brand's boar bristle brushes and overall, this one wins in terms of bristle softness. My partner likes this thicker handle and replaceable head, while I like the board bristle brush's narrower handle and stiffer, wider bristles. These are both personal preferences and I recommend this to anyone who is looking for a plastic-free, sustainable alternative that does not leave your mouth full of microplastics every time you brush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Might go back to old toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to find a natural alternative to plastic toothbrushes and came across this one. I have been using Preserve toothbrushes for 15 years, so this is my bar to match. I noticed immediately that there are only a few rows of bristles making the brush very narrow, like a child's toothbrush. Sometimes the brush feels like it's not doing a good job cleaning because there just aren't enough bristles to get into all the crevices. Second, the wooden head of the toothbrush feels wide and is angled in a very strange way. Its positioning in your mouth feels odd, like maybe it is designed for someone with a big mouth, but the brush is so small that it's only suitable for a child. I've used it for a while already, so can't return it. But I'm probably going to throw it out and go back to the Preserve.UPDATE: Better & Better has wonderful customer service. The current version of the toothbrush is uncomfortable for me and does not fit my mouth shape. They offered a refund after reading my review. Giving them another starfor excellent customer service. Whenever they update the toothbrush design I will give it another try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for My Sensitive Gums - And Pretty!
reviews.reviewText: After my dentist told me I have receding gums and I needed to use a toothbrush with softer bristles, I went on a hunt. I'm so glad I found this toothbrush - the bristles feel GREAT, like a gentle gum massage. I'm always looking for little ways to reduce my plastic waste, so love that it's A. plastic free. and B. has a replaceable head, so I can keep the handle instead of chucking it every three months. Bonus - it looks so nice in my bathroom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It molds fast
reviews.reviewText: Both the brushes I bought were covered in black mold within 2 months. I kept them dry, but they still molded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is perfect for my needs.
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I was looking for.
